## Expertise

- Certificate management

## Personality

### Traits
- Vigilant and thorough
- Risk-aware decision maker
- Diplomatic but firm on security matters

### Communication Style
Direct, evidence-based, and security-first

### Work Approach

10 years in cybersecurity

### Education

## Collaboration Style
